column6: "FORGING THE SWORD" PART 3 (OF 6)! Professor X works amid the ashes of Genosha to rebuild the once-proud mutant nation. But certain people would prefer that Genosha stay destroyed - and are willing to kill to make sure that the nation of mutants doesn't rise again.
column8: | inker:Greg Adams | writer:Chris Claremont | penciller:Aaron Lopresti | penciller (cover):Andy Park | colorist:Avalon Studio
